Side video: Label for the Side video option.
Full size video: Label for the Full size video option.
Left aligned video: Label for the Left aligned video option
Centered video: Label for the Centered video option
Right aligned video: Label for the Right aligned video option
Change video text alternative: Label for the Change video text alternative button.
Text alternative: Label for the video text alternative input.
Enter video caption: Placeholder text for video caption displayed when caption is empty.
Insert video: Label for the insert video toolbar button.
Upload failed: Title of the notification displayed when upload fails.
Video toolbar: The label used by assistive technologies describing an video toolbar attached to an video widget.
